title: 04: S6E04 – "Doorways to Dread" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Lucretia Vastea. WordDogger, Ryan Brennaman, and Seth Paul, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about spectral spaces, undead antagonists, forest fiends, and nefarious nature.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
